PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.introduction: At Ersin Sigorta, we take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how your personal data is collected, used, stored, and protected. It has been prepared in accordance with KVKK (Law No. 6698) and GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation).
PrivacyPolicy.section1Content:
The data controller of your personal data is Ersin Sigorta.

Address: [Company Address]
Email: privacy@ersinsigorta.com
Phone: [Phone Number]
PrivacyPolicy.section2Content:
To provide our services, we collect the following personal data:

• Identity Information: Name, surname, ID number
• Contact Information: Email address, phone number, address
• Financial Information: Payment information, bank account details
• Technical Data: IP address, browser information, cookie data
• Usage Data: System usage logs, transaction history
PrivacyPolicy.section3Content:
Your personal data is processed for the following purposes:

• Creation and management of insurance policies
• Customer service and support
• Fulfillment of legal obligations
• Business process improvement and analysis
• Security and fraud prevention
• Marketing and communication activities (with your consent)
PrivacyPolicy.section4Content:
Your personal data may only be shared with third parties in the following cases:

• Fulfillment of legal obligations
• Our service providers (cloud services, payment processors)
• Insurance companies and agencies
• Requests from authorized legal authorities

All data sharing is done through secure protocols and agreements.
PrivacyPolicy.section5Content:
We take technical and administrative measures to ensure the security of your personal data:

• SSL/TLS encryption
• Secure database systems
• Access control and authorization
• Regular security audits
• Staff training

However, no internet transmission is 100% secure.
PrivacyPolicy.section6Content:
Under KVKK and GDPR, you have the following rights:

• Right to access your personal data
• Right to request correction of your data
• Right to request deletion of your data (right to be forgotten)
• Right to object to processing of your data
• Right to data portability
• Right to object to automated decision-making processes

You can contact us at privacy@ersinsigorta.com to exercise these rights.
PrivacyPolicy.contactContent: For questions about our privacy policy, you can contact us at privacy@ersinsigorta.com.

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.introduction: By using the Ersin Sigorta platform, you agree to the following terms of service. Please read these terms carefully.
TermsOfService.section1Content:
Ersin Sigorta provides a platform for the management, creation, and tracking of insurance policies.

The platform can be used by insurance agents, dealers, and customers.

Our services are continuously improved and may be changed without prior notice.
TermsOfService.section2Content:
When using the platform, you must comply with the following rules:

• Provide accurate and up-to-date information
• Keep your account information secure
• Not engage in illegal activities
• Not violate others' rights
• Not misuse the system
• Respect copyrights
TermsOfService.section3Content:
You are responsible for your account security:

• Keep your password strong and do not share it
• Report suspicious activity immediately
• Enable two-factor authentication
• Log out when not using your session

Users are responsible for any breach of account security.
TermsOfService.section4Content:
Ersin Sigorta does not accept liability in the following cases:

• System outages or technical issues
• Disruptions in third-party services
• Losses due to user errors
• Effects of legal changes
• Natural disasters or extraordinary circumstances

Maximum liability is limited to fees paid in the last 12 months.
TermsOfService.section5Content:
All content, software, and designs on the platform are the intellectual property of Ersin Sigorta:

• Copyrights are protected
• Unauthorized copying is prohibited
• Permission required for commercial use
• Brand names and logos are protected

Legal action may be taken in case of violation.
TermsOfService.section6Content:
Your account may be suspended or terminated in the following cases:

• Violation of terms of service
• Illegal activities
• Suspicion of fraud
• Long-term inactivity
• Legal requirements

Notification will be made before account termination (except in emergency cases).
TermsOfService.contactContent: For questions about terms of service, you can contact us at support@ersinsigorta.com.
